Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a blazing arrow at your foe, dealing lethal damage. The flames wreathing the arrow cause the target to catch fire and sustain fire damage over time.
Blazing_Arrow.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Shadow_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow of nether energy at your target. The target suffers smashing damage from the force of the blow and suffers negative energy damage over time, as the energy seeps into their soul. There is a chance that the target will be immobilized by this attack. There is also a chance that some of the spirit energy will splash on collision with the target, creating a pool of nether energy at the target's feet.
Shadow_Arrow.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Chance for Debuff(Foe)
Shadow_Arrow.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time. There is also a chance you are immobilized.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
You have been ensnared by a nether energy patch created by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Crystal_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow of crystalline nether energy at your target. This arrow pierces the target, causing lethal damage, while the frigid temperature of the arrow causes additional cold damage. This temperature has a chance of crystallizing vapor in the air around the target, giving a small chance of holding the opponent.
Crystal_Arrow.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Lethal/Cold), Chance for Hold(Foe)

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Entangling_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow which releases a strong net upon impact. This net immobilizes an affected target and brings flying targets to the ground. Additionally, there is a lingering loss of movement and attack speeds after the target is freed from the net.
Entangling_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been immobilized and your ability to move around has been hindered. Additionally, your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Call_of_the_Pack.display_help: You call forth a Shadow Wolf to assist you in battle.

Damage_MN.display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_LT.display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_BS.display_target_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_EB.display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_EB.display_target_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_AV.display_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_AV.display_target_help: The Spirit Stalkers are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Dire_Howl.display_help: You unleash a dreadful howl that strikes fear into those arrayed against you. Affected targets suffer energy damage, then negative energy damage over time as the howl's influence takes effect. Targets also suffer reduced resistance to all damage types. There is a small chance that a target will be rendered afraid by the howl, but any target so affected cannot be made afraid again for a long while.
Dire_Howl.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All), Chance for Terrorize(Foe)
Dire_Howl.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and your resistance to all damage types has been reduced. There is also a chance that you are terrorized.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Terrorizes you with their {PowerName}.

Raking_Claws.display_help: You tear at your target with a vicious claw attack, causing lethal damage. Your target is left with wounds which cause additional lethal damage over time.
Raking_Claws.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Shadowfire.display_help: You unleash a cone of dark fire from deep within, scorching all targets within a cone in front of you. These targets suffer both fire and negative energy damage, as the fire licks at the soul of the target. The target is also set ablaze, suffering additional fire damage over time.
Shadowfire.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative Energy/Fire), Minor DoT(Fire)
Shadowfire.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Touch_of_the_Beyond.display_help: You snap at your target, afflicting them with a painful bite that causes negative energy damage over time. This attack also decreases the effectiveness of healing on your target, an effect which is refreshed each time the target is bitten, until healing has no effect.
Touch_of_the_Beyond.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time. The effectiveness of all healing on you has been reduced.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Primal_Roar.display_help: You unleash a primal roar which strikes at the very heart of your opponents. This attack deals energy damage as the sound of the roar reverberates around you. The attack also reduces your opponents' resistance to all types of damage and leaves them suffering negative energy damage over time due to a loss of morale.
Primal_Roar.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG (Energy), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All),
Primal_Roar.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and your resistance to all damage types has been reduced.

Eviscerate.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal/Negative Energy), Moderate DoT (Lethal)
Eviscerate.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Soul_Rend.display_help: You snap at your target, ripping into their body with nether energy infused jaws. This causes lethal damage and negative energy damage over time.
Soul_Rend.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Negative Energy)
Soul_Rend.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Maul.display_help: You slash at your target with your paws. This causes lethal damage and has a chance to knock your target back with the force of the blow.
Maul.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Natures_Fury.display_help: You rapidly snap at all targets in a cone in front of you, causing lethal damage with each bite to all affected targets.
Natures_Fury.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Breath_of_the_Nether.display_help: You unleash a blast of nether energy at your foes, causing negative energy damage and terrorizing them.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Terrorize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Terrorizes you with their {PowerName}.

Nether_Barrage.display_help: You unleash a powerful burst of nether energy in a cone before you, causing negative energy damage to all nearby. The intensity of this burst is enough to set opponents ablaze, causing additional fire damage over time.
Nether_Barrage.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Negative Energy), Minor DoT (Fire)
Nether_Barrage.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Thrill_of_the_Hunt.display_help: You call upon a pack of Shadow Wolves to assault a single target. These Wolves charge the target, attack it once and then flee.
Thrill_of_the_Hunt.display_target_help: You are under assault by a pack of Shadow Wolves.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} calls upon a pack of Shadow Wolves to charge you.

Leader_of_the_Pack.display_help: You inspire yourself and your allies with a powerful howl, increasing damage, run speed and perception.
